contents:
even the flame burn the body，also，be quite rocksteady （phonetic：kui rvkstedi），until the life is spent。

Finally we found the problem that the zhaoqi pool is jammed。So I stabbed （pronounce：took） it and then there is shit spraying on my whole face，shit is on whole face

是不是有bug？我打完之后，编辑再发布就变成删除了
